问题：Cannot find shared library libffi.so.7 解决方案 手动安装
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/libffi7.git cd libffi7 makepkg -si

桌面环境为 KDE
sudo pacman -S ibus-rime yay -S ibus-qt  vim ~/.xprofile
export GTK_IM_MODULE=ibus export XMODIFIERS=@im=ibus export QT_IM_MODULE=ibus ibus-daemon -d -x  FAQ 问题：候选词横排显示设置无效 IBus Preferences → Font and Style → Candidates orientation: Horizontal
解决方案 vim /usr/share/rime-data/ibus_rime.yaml
style: # candidate list orientation (false|true). horizontal: true
